Es Portal

[h1]Hipnótico[/h1]
Uno de mis juegos favoritos. La sensación de abrir portales y ver que es lo que ocurre me tiene todavía hipnotizado después de tantos años. 

Para los que hayan vivido en otro planeta en estos años y no sepa de qué va os explico que Portal es un juego de resolución de puzles a partir de interactuar con el entorno mediante portales. El juego tiene una visión en primera persona y tu personaje es una chica metida en una especie de experimento a lo pelicula CUBE.

La única pega es que se hace muy corto y que no tiene funciones online (subsanado en Portal 2 con un buen cooperativo)
Recomendadisima la compra y recomiendo jugarlo antes de Portal 2 para ver la transformación del entorno.

Nota: [b]9.5/10[/b]

THERE IS AN AI HELL

The cake may be a lie, but I can't lie - this is an excellent game! I personally am not fond of first-person shooters, due to games like Doom and Half-Life, among other M-rated titles. However, this is a puzzle game where you don't shoot demons or aliens with bullets and see gore; you're shooting portals at walls, ceilings, and floors, and robots are the things that "die".

This game is rated T, and only because of the blood splatters. The way the character dies is surprisingly non-violent: You are looking from the floor, and anything you are holding skid away from you on the floor. Then you press a key (or button), and it brings you back to the last save point. Simple as that!

If you've played Half-Life, this is a good compliment to the series. If not, it does good on its own.

portal è un puzle game in prima persona sviluppato dalla Valve, il cui scopo è usufruire dell'omonima portalgun per risolvere gli enigmi e fuggire. man mano che si avanza la storia diventa più intrigante e gli enigmi sempre più difficili. gioco molto consigliato perchè divertente e occupa molto tempo. un buonissimo acquiso.

If you're just going for story completion, it's a very short game. My time played is how long it took me to beat this, it's fairly easy. To be completely honest, I probably didnt do 1 or 2 tests in the way they should've been done because of how easy it is to cheese some of them. Overall, its a great game, but very short. There are more bonus chambers and challenges but that may not be your thing. If you're looking to kill some time and work your brain, pick it up and play it if you haven't already.
Pensaba que era casi solo un juego de puzzles sin más... pero tiene una historia llamativa.

Отличная головоломка для тех, кто любит думать. Отличная графика, динамика. Изначально игра может показаться скучной и легкой, но наберитесь терпения, все самое интересное впереди. Особенно «Портал» порадует фанатов «Half life», которым так не хватало загадок. Многие из нас хоть раз хотели бы куда - нибудь телепортироваться или просто «нырнуть» в портал... Мечты сбываются! Думайте, размышляйте и создавайте порталы, ведь в данном шедевре нет границ!

Nekem baromira tetszett az egész játémenete.A feladványok abszolúte nem nehéz,a történet legkötött.Teljesen megérte a mostani árát,főleg hogy most nyári leárazás van.Sajnos a portál 2 nekem előbb sikerült megvennem és kijátszanom, így nem igazán tudtam,hogy mégis mi történhetett az elöző részben.De mostmár tudom.Aki tervezi megvenni és kijátszani,az melegen ajánlom a játékot.Bár a játékidőt sajnálom,hogy ennyi idő alatt kijátszaható.De sebaj,megérte így is

A genious piece of work, classic. Absoltely recommended for those who like solving mind-twisting puzzles, and eating cakes.
There was cake, trust me.

I'd never played Portal before, only the second game. I picked up the first one in a "complete my bundle" for the Portal games and I've really enjoyed it. Some of the puzzles were surprisingly difficult. My only gripe is that the macOS version is very outdated and wouldn't go beyond the 1280x800 resolution (my Macbook Pro has a 2560x1600 display). The macOS Mojave beta also warned me that the game wouldn't run sometime in the future as the application is 32-bit (which macOS will soon be dropping support for).

－　遊戲評價10/10　－

雖然該遊戲的劇情長度很短，但該遊戲依然被認為是2007年最出色的遊戲。雖然每一關都有監視攝影機，但是主角從沒看過本設施中任何一個人。（邊緣人）

在遊戲中裡GLaDOS並答應主角完成所有實驗室的測試後會得到蛋糕作為獎勵，但是當主角完成所有關卡後，卻讓主角跑進會移動平台帶她到焚化爐之中。（當然！主角絕對不死的）

在逃離的過程中，看到許多逃生字眼和其他等，但其中最著名的是「the cake is a lie」（蛋糕是個謊言）。


最後...

因為很好玩就順手買了傳送門２０ｗ０。

Un super Gameplay mélant FPS, Plateforme et Reflexion/Puzzle. Audacieux, mais brillament réussi.
La seule ombre au tableau, c'est la durée de vie plutôt courte, au moins pour l'aventure de base (les cartes bonus et les succès Steam peuvent l'allonger un peu). Et encore, vu le faible prix auquel on peut se le procurer, il ne faut pas hésiter un seul instant!
Super concept, super ambiance, super jeu.
Du coup, je me suis précipité sur Portal 2 que je n'avais pas encore. J'éspère que ce serai aussi bon et encore meilleurs. Je vais de ce pas le découvrir! Alors A+

I like this game, just as the first one, but there are somethings that I don’t like, like it's very simple (compared to Portal 2), and achievements are pretty simple, too.
But the Soundtrack and Good graphics (being a game from 2007 (On high Settings)), the history, and the price are pretty good, really recommend buying, but you should buy the Portal pack with the 2 releases, because I prefer the second game because of difficulty, and the coop, but the histories of the games are a little bit “connect” between each other.
Also I recommend getting the achievements of this game, because they're very challenging.

Muy buen juego. Los gráficos y el arte son hermosos. El juego consiste en utilizar portales para superar una serie de puzzles. La historia es entretenida, corta y atrapante. Muy buena jugabilidad, pasé como 2 horas probando efectos con los portales. El tiempo estimado de juego es de 2 horas, y no me parece muy re-jugable, será decisión personal el si vale o no la pena adquirilo por el precio completo.
